name: Tech Specter
desc1: Tech Specter is an Organization Management Full Stack website.
desc2: Users can purchase different types of courses, can booked travel, can read different types of blogs also can request donors for blood.
desc3: Dashboard is available for both user and admin.
desc4: Payment method is included. Users can view and delete their purchases or bookings and can add reviews. Admin can add an admin, delete or update services, and approve orders.

name: Mobile Panda
desc1: Users can view and purchase different type of Mobiles
desc2: Dashboard is available for both user and admin.
desc3: User can view and delete their purchases and can add reviews.
desc4: Admin can add an admin, delete or update services and can approve order.

name: Bike Zone
desc1: Bike Zone is a full-stack and responsive website for bike lovers
desc2: Users can order different types of bikes and also can see detailed info on bikes from the website.
desc3: The dashboard is available for both the User and Admin. Users can see their own order list and also can cancel an order.
desc4: The admin can add new bikes, delete bikes, can see all the orders, and also can can confirm order from the dashboard.

name: Food Sense
desc1: Food Sense is a full-stack and responsive food delivery site for food lovers.
desc2: Users can check their desired food, cost of that food and can book their particular food from this website.
desc3: The authentication system of Food Sense is firebase google login authentication.
desc4: Also can approve order and can add new food from the dashboard.

name: Medi-Pharma
desc1: Medi Pharma is a responsive e-medicine website.
desc2: Users can find their medicine, vaccine, medical consultation, and doctor receipt from this website.
desc3: The main features of Medi Pharma are firebase email password and google login authentication.

name: Travel Mate
desc1: Travel Mate is a full-stack and responsive travel booking site for travelers.
desc2: Users can check their desired travel location, cost of the package and can book their particular package from this website.
desc3: The authentication system of Travel Mate is firebase google login authentication.

name: Personal Portfolio
desc1: Travel Mate is a full-stack and responsive travel booking site for travelers.
desc2: Users can check their desired travel location, cost of the package and can book their particular package from this website.
desc3: The authentication system of Travel Mate is firebase google login authentication.

name: Language Center
desc1: This project is all about a online training center, Where people can find and do the wonderful courses.
desc2: This project was created with very popular JavaScript library React and react-bootstrap framework.
desc3: You can choose you needy courses and also our brochure courses.

name: Bestseller Books Writer BD
desc1: In this project I've used very famous javascript library which is react.
desc2: You can see the Bestseller books writer of Bangladesh and their Best books through this website.
desc3: You can check the age, email, books category and also the price.

name: React Meal DB
desc1: In this project I've used very famous javascript library which is react.
desc2: You can see the Best food collections, and also you can add your desired food to your cart.
desc3: You can watch different food categories and also you can search your desired food.

name: Fashion Store
desc1: In this project I've used fake API and DOM manipulation.
desc2: You can see the products and also you can add your desired product to your cart.
desc3: You can also can check the product price.

name: Book Archive
desc1: In this project I've used Rest API and fetch data from the API.
desc2: You can search your desired book and it will show you the list of books.
desc3: I've used DOM manipulation to show the books list.

name: Mac-book-pro Calculator
desc1: In this project I've used Raw HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
desc2: Here simply you can calculate price of your mac-book-pro configuration.
desc3: Here we included Memory, Storage, and delivery cost.

name: Honda CBR 150R
desc1: In this project I've used Raw HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

desc3: It's totally responsive and I've used Bootstrap for responsive.

name: Hungry Monster
desc1: In this project I've used Raw HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
desc2: Here you can search your desired food and it will show you the details of food recipe. And you can also check the ingredients.
desc3: Here you can check the video tutorial link of the food recipe, also can add this food to the cart.

name: Pin Matcher
desc1: In this project I've used Raw HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

desc1: In this project I've used Raw HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
